it.uniba.utils

Class Arguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.utils.Arguments

  • public class Arguments
extends java.lang.Object
    Arguments.java ||Entity|| This class uses the string taken by an external class and stores the data into local variables, ready to be read with included getter methods. It includes data fields(yy-mm-dd), an user id, a limit field, a weight field, a tag field and an edge field. The constructor includes different patterns to distinguish the type of the string value and setting the relative value of the attribute.
